alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 30 at 7:35PM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Michigan... Sturgeon River near Alston affecting Houghton and Baraga Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Monday afternoon at 200 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by excessive rainfall are occurring. * WHERE...Sturgeon River near Alston. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Homes and structures along the low lying areas and numerous roads become impacted by flood water. In Houghton County...Sturgeon River Road...Aho Road...and Rajala Road are impacted. In Baraga County...Sturgeon Road...Halonen Road and Usitalo Road are impacted. Along Froberg Road...Tahtinen Road... Irwin Road...Oliver Road...and Shirley Road are impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.9 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 7.5 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
